original_title: Do Rahain / Mil Gayi Manzil Mujhe
overview: Directed by Lekh Tandon in 1997. While pursuing a story on a tribal uprising and its mysterious leader, a fearless television journalist and her cameraman travel to the tribal heartland for an interview and, on the way, fall in love.
title: Do Rahain / Mil Gayi Manzil Mujhe
